DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effectiveness of a combined dermatological treatment in children up to 5 years old with mild or moderated atopic dermatitis.
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness of a Combined Dermatological Treatment in Children With Atopic Dermatitis
DOC.criteria: Children from 1 month to 5 years old Patients with atopic dermatitis mildmoderate with an SCORAD=1640 Other dermatological diseases that could interfere with the study results Corticoids use during 3 weeks prior to the study Antibiotics use to treat atopic dermatitis during 3 weeks prior to the study Use of topical immunomodulators Concurrent use of other emollients
